document_name: Energy Sources Regulations (Energy Efficiency and Information on Energy Consumption of Refrigeration Equipment), 2004.
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/ISR/2004/ISR-2004-01-01-Energy Sources Regulations (Energy Efficiency and Information on Energy Consumption of Refrigeration Equipment), 2004._1cd43c8356da66d3687d9e1d4e99d9a7.pdf
document_description: The regulations set energy efficiency standards for air conditioners, refrigerators and freezers, preventing the manufacturing, sale, import, marketing or exhibition of appliances which fail to meet the standard.
